name: Atiq Israk
title: Product Manager
specialization: Product Management, Business Strategy, Go-to-Market Planning
objective: Forward-thinking Product Manager with 6+ years of experience translating customer needs into profitable, user-centric solutions. Skilled in product pricing, business strategy, and go-to-market planning. Adept at defining user journeys, managing complex roadmaps, and balancing revenue vs. cost to align with business goals.
